maintainer.content: Maintainer of the Networks module in aeon and all of three Deep Learning sub-modules for Classification / Regression / Clustering.
Maintaining the ROCKET GPU implementations in the transformation module.
Maintaining the ShapeDTW similarity measure in the distances module.

mentor.content: Mentoring with Tony Bagnall and Matthew Middlehurst: Aadya Chinubhai on a project that focuses on implementing deep learning based models for time series clustering. More details about the GSoC project here and detailed weekly updated Medium blogs here.

Mentoring with Tony Bagnall and Matthew Middlehurs: Balgopal Moharana on a project that focuses on implementing deep learning based models for time series forecasting. More details about the GSoC project here.

tutorial.content: Myself ( ) and the rest of aeon's core developers ( ) presented a tutorial on time series machine learning at the ECML/PKDD 2024 conference. I presented the section of deep learning based methods for time series analysis. We the presenters got an award for having a session with big attendance ( ).

Myself ( ), the rest of aeon's core developers, and Germain Forestier ( ) presented a tutorial on time series classification and extrinsic regression at the SIG-KDD 2024 conference. I presented the section of dictionary based methods for time series classification.
For more information check out the associated paper.
